summary.span: 命名空间包含一些类、接口和枚举，它们使语言级别的代码表达式能够表示为表达式目录树形式的对象。

span.span: The namespace contains classes, interfaces and enumerations that enable language-level code expressions to be represented as objects in the form of expression trees.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象类提供用于对模型表达式树类层次结构的根。The abstract class provides the root of a class hierarchy used to model expression trees. 派生自此命名空间中的类，例如和，用于表示表达式树中的节点。The classes in this namespace that derive from , for example and , are used to represent nodes in an expression tree. 类包含`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 工厂方法，用于创建表达式的各种类型的树节点。The class contains `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) factory methods to create expression tree nodes of the various types. 枚举类型指定唯一的节点类型。The enumeration type specifies the unique node types.
